title: R. K. Narayan
summary: Rasipuram Krishnaswami Iyer Narayanaswami (10 October 1906 â€“ 13 May 2001)[1] was an Indian writer known for his work set in the fictional South Indian town of Malgudi. He was a leading author of early Indian literature in English along with Mulk Raj Anand and Raja Rao.
